resources.string: Fire-resistant, strong offensive power, and high adaptation to hot environments; useful in combat and for enduring high temperatures.
Conducts electricity and resists electric exposure; fast diggers and capable of reaching great height when thrown.
Has gills that allow breathing and functioning underwater; excellent swimmer and effective in aquatic environments.
Small and very fast, with natural poison and toxin resistance; ideal for speed tasks and poison damage.
Very heavy and extremely strong, with high carrying capacity; slow but capable of causing great physical damage and moving heavy objects.
Rocky body and highly resistant; ideal for breaking obstacles and absorbing physical damage.
Flight capability and great agility in the air; superior mobility though with lower attack power.
Generates and maintains ice, immune to cold and able to freeze areas; vulnerable to fire.
Active in nocturnal and underground environments, with unique movement and grouping abilities that enable light formations and collective teleportation.
